data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ghaderi, Reza, Karegar, Akbar (2016): One new and three known species of Geocenamus Thorne & Malek, 1968 (Nematoda: Merliniidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4079 (2): 151-178, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.2.1
